-------------


.. cpp:function:: int* socketeeClient(inet addr, int port, bool aysnc)

	Fucntion to codfdfdafnnet to a clfdfdfient on ip addr:port.

	:param addr: address of the host
	:type addr: inet
	:param port: port of the host
	:type port: int
	:returns: an integer indicating if the connection was successful
	:rtype: int*


this page shows and exf dfd
